title: Has the NFL Fined Cam Newton $253,552 for Giving Away Footballs?
subtitle: Rumor holds that Carolina Panthers quarterback Cam Newton is penalized thousands of dollars by the NFL every time he hands a football to a fan in the stands.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Carolina Panthers quarterback Cam Newton has been fined a total of $253, 552 for giving away footballs to fans.
